keywords: Pray for India-3 Tera India, Mera India, Apna India

verse.name: v1
lines: Pray for India-3
Tera India, Mera India, Apna India

verse.name: v2
lines: 1. Saari duniya se hai nirala India
Sabki nigahon ka ujala India
Isko lage na kisi gair ki nazar
Chamke jahan mein pyara-2 India

verse.name: v3
lines: 2. Yaaron apna to bas ek hi khuda
Milke rahenge hum honge na juda
Bahkaye humko na koi shaitaan
Aao maange milke khuda se yeh dua

verse.name: v4
lines: 3. Gaon shahar gali-2 jaana hai
Pyar ka paigam sabko sunana hai
Pyar qaidiyon ko hai azad karta
Pyar dushman ko bhi maaf karta

verse.name: v5
lines: 4. You love India I love India
God loves India too,
Come lift your hands and make a prayer
And heâ€™s gonna answer you.

verse.name: v6
lines: 5. Mumbai Punjab Delhi ho ya Bangalore
Jahan jahan dekho bas, Yeshu ka hai shor
Saari duniya pe, Yeshu raaj karta
Naam se Yeshu ke hai, shaitan darta
